1.0.2.name: wordpress/wordplurk-improve
1.0.2.description:
Generates Plurk Updates when a new Post is Published, Useing Official Plurk api, and Setting improve. Orginal Home page http://blog.bluefur.com/wordplurk Post Plurk Responses can show after the post.

** Github page ** https://github.com/renn999/Wordplurk-improve

** Bug Report ** https://github.com/renn999/Wordplurk-improve/issues

If you want to report bug or add new language. Please open a new issue using github. :-)
